featured.text: Here all the dogs are given a bath using professional shampoo and conditioners in a massaging tub.
the air conditioner to make yourself feel comfortable.

definition.zh_def: 護髮素，一種用於護理頭髮的產品，通常在洗髮後使用，以改善髮質和光澤。
definition.en_def: A hair care product used after shampooing to improve the texture and shine of hair.
definition.example: She applied conditioner to her hair to make it softer and easier to manage.
